body_html:
I'm not sure what the actual reason why it doesn't work, but I've formulated a workaround.

  1. During compile time, you can add flags to the compile time invocation by changing the functions in crosstool_wrapper_is_not_gcc to emit the correct lines
  2. I added a linker path in the bazel file for the rule tf_cc_shared_object
  3. Any not found symbols at the end of the compile, manually change it using patchelf.

And that works

Any not found symbols at the end of the compile, manually change it using patchelf.

And that works
body:
I'm not sure what the actual reason why it doesn't work, but I've formulated a workaround.

1. During compile time, you can add flags to the compile time invocation by changing the functions in crosstool_wrapper_is_not_gcc to emit the correct lines
2. I added a linker path in the bazel file for the rule tf_cc_shared_object
3. Any not found symbols at the end of the compile, manually change it using patchelf.

And that works
